headline: NRG Energy (NRG): Rethinking Valuation After a Strong Year-to-Date Rally and Recent Pullback
summary: NRG Energy (NRG) has quietly become one of this year’s stronger utility names, with the stock up roughly 73% year to date, even after a modest pullback over the past month. See our latest analysis for NRG Energy. The latest pullback looks more like a breather than a reversal, with the share price at $160.15 after a strong year to date share price return and a standout multi year total shareholder return. This signals that investors are steadily repricing NRG’s growth and risk profile. If...

headline: Is NRG Energy Still Attractive After a 72.7% 2025 Surge?
summary: Wondering if NRG Energy is still a smart buy after its huge run up, or if the easy money has already been made? Let us break down what the current price really implies about its value. Despite a recent pullback of around 4% over the last week and 3.1% over the last month, NRG is still up an impressive 72.7% year to date and 77.6% over the past year, with a staggering 446.9% gain over three years. Those kinds of returns have been fueled by NRG’s strategic pivot toward higher margin retail and...
